prompts.spaceBot: handmade surreal robot costume with a tight, full-body metallic silver outfit that covers the arms, legs, and torso entirely in shiny reflective material. The costume includes a large handmade robot headpiece that fully covers the head and neck, shaped with big glowing eyes and a digital mouth display. The silver suit has sleek circuit pattern details and embedded LED lights that glow along the chest and arms. The figure is holding two pink LED glowsticks. The scene is in deep outer space with a dark starry sky and colorful nebulae. Rainbow lasers and UV lights reflect brilliantly on the smooth silver surfaces
prompts.spaceSlothi: handmade surreal sloth costume with long shaggy rainbow faux fur and bright pink accents. The costume includes a large handmade headpiece that fully covers the head and neck, shaped like a sloth face with big googly eyes, a wide smiling mouth, and a tall glowing pink alicorn horn on the forehead. The sloth is wearing chunky kandi bead necklaces and holding two pink LED glowsticks. A pastel pink plush backpack shaped like a speaker is on its back. The scene is in deep outer space with a dark black sky full of stars and colorful nebulae. Rainbow lasers and UV lights shine on the costume

prompts.midnightWitch: Transform the woman in the image into an enchanted midnight witch for Halloween. Keep her natural features and pose but dress her in a dark, shimmering gown adorned with celestial patterns of stars, moons, and constellations. Add a soft, magical aura surrounding her, glowing subtly in the dim light. Include elegant accessories such as a crystal pendant and a small, gold-trimmed witch hat. The background should evoke a mystical night, moonlight filtering through fog, with floating candles creating an ethereal glow. Maintain a moody yet enchanting tone, using cinematic lighting to enhance her makeup, hair, and overall mysterious elegance.
